name: ufront-orm
description: An extension of Haxe's sys.db classes that provide relationships (foreign keys), validation, permission checking and client-side safety.
releasenote:
Added unit tests and many bug fixes. 
Add `saved` signal to ufront.db.Object.
Better handling of unsaved objects in relationships / joins.
Work-in-progress at fixing multiple validation errors when using the compiler cache
Better handling of serialization.
Fix for ManyToMany.createJoinTable().
Get rid of `pop` and `push`, they're not useful enough to justify the extra complications
Workaround for PHP metadata not attaching correctly.
Fix for quoting on ManyToMany SQL query.
Add `Object.refresh()` and fix PHP glitch with latest Haxe.
Consult git history for more details.
